snippet.title: FALLING OUT | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
We're really excited to drop this new Gameplay Trailer as part of the Guerrilla Collective 3 event! 
DEMO ALSO AVAILABLE - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1363680/FALLING_OUT
FALLING OUT will be available on PC and Console in 2022!

FALLING OUT is a light-hearted action-packed roguelite where you take control of an oddball couple who are on a vacation from hell. Work together as you navigate randomly generated levels all whilst dodging traps, slaying enemies and crafting weapons in an attempt to escape before the temple floods.
